channel.title: FlareSoft - Holds 2000+, BUCKET LOAD OF CONTENT, REAL 474, RELEASED
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i54.tinypic.com/rqyxat.png[/img] [b]FlareSoft[/b][i]#474[/i] [i]Let's revolutionize RSPS[/i]
I quit. :)
[b]PLEASE COMMENT ABOUT WHAT YOU THINK![/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?rqmvsl0unubn70i
[b]Client[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?4jxzmaq5irxzxcl
Features [code]- PERFECT PERFECT PERFECT FLAWLESS COMBAT - [near] Perfect Chaos Elemental - [near] Perfect KBD - [near] PERFECT GOD WARS BOSS ROOMS - [near] PERFECT CLIPPED NPC FOLLOWING - [near] Perfect DFS spec - [near] Perfect Giant Mole - Awesome Giant Sea Snake - AWESOME A MAGE'S REVENGE QUEST :D - Start of Dragon Slayer quest <.< - Daggonoth Kings - Fight Pits - Barrows - Warriors Guild - Clothing boothes - Canoes - Dragonfire shield - Server sided following - Item picking - Magic carpet - Cow milking - Sedidor - Shantay Pass - Sheep Sheer - Spade dig - Teletabs - Tutorial island - Gertudes cat - Dragon slayer - Like 15 special attacks - Dog shoo away - Improved agility - Firemaking - Prayer - Thieving - Improved woodcutting - Improved mining - Improved cannon - Cats - Sounds - Pest Control start - Wilderness Obelisks - Castle Wars start - Clan Chat - Cannons - Stronghold of security - Daggonoth cave - Awesome portal system[/code]
[b]Giant Mole[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r2vAG24n1mc
[b]A Mage's Revenge[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hD2COWzQHZo (Just Boss, Updated) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vl8boImj4E (Full quest, outdated, commentary)
[b]KBD[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WPofXf64Fk8 (Also includes updated Saradomin)
[b]God Wars[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O-E82bIG9Dk http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hLTDKufTqXs (Saradomin, outdated)
[b]Clipped NPC Following[/b] (Since many said I was faking) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMg77KqG5BY]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMg77KqG5BY[/url] (Updated NPC grinding) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j0Olv5_Ob1I]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j0Olv5_Ob1I[/url]
[b]Combat Preview[/b] (Since many said I was faking when I said [b]FLAWLESS[/b] combat) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s82i2KjcJos]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s82i2KjcJos[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpkbzPBGjQw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpkbzPBGjQw[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xb-Q_gOKUPo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xb-Q_gOKUPo[/url]
[b]Warrior's Guild[/b] (Early development) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SEqVbRz5vAg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SEqVbRz5vAg[/url]

item.title: FlareSoft - Holds 2000+, BUCKET LOAD OF CONTENT, REAL 474, RELEASED
item.dc:creator: @zygis227 zygis227
item.description:
@zygis227 wrote:

[quote=“x64, post:71, topic:369267”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=465399.msg3405110#msg3405110 date=1290268732]

A reminder to everyone on this thread, non of this work is his. This server is based of Rs2-Server 474 and was sold to him earlier during the development stage. The original open source is located here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465638.0.html

He edited so much of the original source, but put an anti-leech in it.
But once you get past the anti-leech, that original source isn’t even worth it.

What makes this 474 special is the combat, nothing more. Writing content takes skills and a good creative mind (depending on how original the content is). From what i can see everything added in this server has been ripped, also when we sold canownueasy the server it was a much newer build, therefore already contained the platform for creating the new mini-games skills. Plus the person who we sold i to already has a poor history when it comes to development, the majority of his work is always ripped or he buys other people’s work.

I’d much rather use Canownueasy’s work then Scu11, Scar, and whomever else.
And that’s funny… He only bought that one source.
And he didn’t ‘rip’ any codes haha.
[/quote]

His previous releases contained a RAT which lead to a ban for him on Rune-Server.

  1. I am Scar, i am also known as x64.
  2. What makes you think he hasnt ripped content, when clearly for a start non of this is his work, ( all he did was add npc dialogues and rip a few minigames).
  3. If you think that this is the only source that he has purchased then sorry to say you know nothing and what has happened in the past.

I am no longer going to post on this thread as it no longer has any value, it’s not his work, and he doesn’t know how to release opensource material.[/quote]

1st lamfo i was on beta testing he did much more then you said well this is not the newest data from my ayes the maps are worse then in beta
it’s going to take me an 1-2hr’s of cache editing and ripping to fix them but everything seems to be normal well i relay wondered why didn’t fix teleporting fro spell book theres code from home tele it should be easy to edit that to work with all spells the buttons work that is guaranteed
any ways its much better than any other source’s

Read full topic
item.source: FlareSoft - Holds 2000+, BUCKET LOAD OF CONTENT, REAL 474, RELEASED

item.title: FlareSoft - Holds 2000+, BUCKET LOAD OF CONTENT, REAL 474, RELEASED
item.dc:creator: @x64 x64
item.description:
@x64 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:70, topic:369267”][quote author=x64 link=topic=465399.msg3405103#msg3405103 date=1290268543]

A reminder to everyone on this thread, non of this work is his. This server is based of Rs2-Server 474 and was sold to him earlier during the development stage. The original open source is located here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465638.0.html

He edited so much of the original source, but put an anti-leech in it.
But once you get past the anti-leech, that original source isn’t even worth it.

What makes this 474 special is the combat, nothing more. Writing content takes skills and a good creative mind (depending on how original the content is). From what i can see everything added in this server has been ripped, also when we sold canownueasy the server it was a much newer build, therefore already contained the platform for creating the new mini-games skills. Plus the person who we sold i to already has a poor history when it comes to development, the majority of his work is always ripped or he buys other people’s work.
[/quote]
I’d much rather use Canownueasy’s work then Scu11, Scar, and whomever else.
And that’s funny… He only bought that one source.
And he didn’t ‘rip’ any codes haha.[/quote]

His previous releases contained a RAT which lead to a ban for him on Rune-Server.

  1. I am Scar, i am also known as x64.
  2. What makes you think he hasnt ripped content, when clearly for a start non of this is his work, ( all he did was add npc dialogues and rip a few minigames).
  3. If you think that this is the only source that he has purchased then sorry to say you know nothing and what has happened in the past.

I am no longer going to post on this thread as it no longer has any value, it’s not his work, and he doesn’t know how to release opensource material.

Read full topic

item.title: FlareSoft - Holds 2000+, BUCKET LOAD OF CONTENT, REAL 474, RELEASED
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:56, topic:369267”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=465399.msg3404474#msg3404474 date=1290215870]

Comments aren’t causing any errors.

The comments are ignored by both the JVM on runtime, and the Java Interpreter whilst compiling.

yes, i just checked it, and its not those, but these are errors beyond my knowledge.
so anyways, someone good with java will have to fix all 100 errors in the client, may just be a bracket, but i dont think it would be easy to find :o
[/quote]

Use the help section or maybe PM an active,decent coder for help.
& what does the anti-leech do anyways?[/quote]
looks at I vain I
if its not too much to ask vain, could you take a look at these java files, and see what you can do to fix them?

Read full topic
